tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE projects ( project_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, start_date DATE, end_date DATE );
CREATE TABLE backers ( backer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, backer_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE NOT NULL, project_id UUID REFERENCES projects(project_id) );

CREATE TABLE project_backer (
  project_id UUID,
  backer_id UUID,
  PRIMARY KEY (project_id, backer_id),
  CONSTRAINT fk_project FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES project(project_id),
  CONSTRAINT fk_backer FOREIGN KEY (backer_id) REFERENCES backer(backer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    project_description TEXT,
    project_start_date DATE,
    project_end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE backers (
    backer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    backer_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    backer_email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    backer_phone VARCHAR(15),
    backer_address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE project_backers (
    project_id INT,
    backer_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (project_id, backer_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES projects(project_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (backer_id) REFERENCES backers(backer_id)
);
